text: "Inje" (English: Hoarfrost) is a song performed by Montenegrin singer Vanja Radovanović. The song was released as a digital download on 6 April 2018. The song was written and produced by Radovanović. ==Eurovision Song Contest== The song represented Montenegro in the Eurovision Song Contest 2018 in Lisbon, Portugal. The song competed in the second semi-final, held on 10 May 2018. However, it did not qualify for the grand final. ==Track listing== ==Release history== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! Region ! Date ! Format ! Label |- ! scope="row"| Various | 6 April 2018 | Digital download | Universal Music |} ==References== Category:2018 songs Category:Eurovision songs of 2018 Category:Eurovision songs of Montenegro
title: Inje (song)
